item.title: Made minigame need tele to get there
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

Add that in your clickingmost.java

case 28171:
//c.q6help();
c.triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, 0);
c.sM("You go to NAME");
break;

In your texthandler.java look for all the c.q6â€™s. change the name of them all , example:

if(c.q6 == 0){
c.sendQuest("@or1@NAME", 7339); }
if(c.q6 > 0){
c.sendQuest("@or1@NAME", 7339); }
if(c.q6 == 15){
c.sendQuest("@or1@NAME", 7339); }

Usually they are not together, yet messed up randomly, but in my server I have made everything easy to read and work on.

If you know and have coded 317 for a while you should know what to change and where to put this stuff.

Read full topic
